metadata.title: CVE-2015-7684 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: Unrestricted file upload in GLPI before 0.85.3 allows remote authenticatedusers to execute arbitrary code by adding a file with an executableextension as an attachment to a new ticket, then accessing it via a directrequest to the file in files/_tmp/.

criterions.comment: glpi: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
